import'./background.css';export function backgroundStyleByTemp(t){if(typeof t!="undefined"){//проверяем существует ли температура
if(t.temp&&t.temp>=30){return"app hot";}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=20){return"app warm20";}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=15){return"app warm15";}if(t.temp&&t.temp>=0){return"app warm";}if(t.temp&&t.temp<=-1){return"app cold";}if(t.temp&&t.temp<=-20){return"app cold20";}}else{return"app";}}
